about.title: About
about.paragraph1: I am a hard-working and capable developer that has always been passionate about technology and taking on challenging and diverse projects.
about.paragraph2: As a Full Stack Developer, I had the opportunity to plan, desig and implement features web applications and APIs. My main tech stack is: Ruby on Rails, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, ReactJS, PostgreSQL, among others. Also, I have integrated these systems with third party APIs such as Twilio, Stripe, Sidekiq, Sentry and Sendinblue. In all of my projects I seek to apply valuable leadership skills while making productivity and delivery time top priorities. Furthermore, as a Computer Science student, I strive to develop my theoretical and practical skills to stay relevant in this fast growing sector.
about.paragraph3: When I am not focused on tech, I enjoy my time learning to play the guitar, practice Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu and work on my motorcycle.
portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.paragraph: Check out some of my latest projects.  The repositories can be seen at github and you can play around with some of the games that I have written at Replit.
contact.title: Contact
contact.paragraph: I am interested in full-time or freelance opportunities - especially on ambitious or large projects. However, if you have any other requests or questions, don't hesitate to contact me using below form of over at LinkedIn.
contact.name: Name
